txt.en: Berries can be found along the coastline of the Cape of Belfalas.\n\nYou should collect berries.

'Good day to you! I am just a simple merchant. I pass through here from time to time, bearing goods between Linhir and Dol Amroth, and do not stay very long, but decided that perhaps I needed a break from the day to day work, and to relax for a while.\n\n'I have heard the wild berries that grow along the cliffs here are delicious. Would you care to search for some? I would not mind to trying some myself, that is if you don't mind sharing with this stranger!'
'Delicious! If that is not the best berry I have ever tasted, then I do not know what is!'
Cranniel, a passing merchant, is interested in sampling the wild berries dotting the shoreline.
Cranniel is located near the lighthouse on the Cape of Belfalas.\n\nYou should share some of the berries you collected with Cranniel.
